hero.title: Professional Portrait & Graduation Photography
hero.subtitle: San Diego-based photographer specializing in portraits, professional headshots, and graduation photography. Capturing authentic moments with an artistic eye and professional touch.

about.title: About Daniel Schacht
about.lead: Working with Daniel Schacht for photography is a great choice because of his versatility, professionalism, and artistic eye.
content: Daniel captures not just a scene, but a story. Known for his easygoing demeanor and strong attention to detail, he brings both technical skill and creative vision to every photography session.

Whether you need professional headshots for your career, beautiful family portraits, or memorable graduation photos, Daniel provides personalized portrait photography services throughout the San Diego area.

services.name: Portrait Photography
services.description: Capture your authentic self with professional portrait sessions. Perfect for personal branding, family photos, and artistic portraits.

services.name: Professional Headshots
services.description: Stand out with compelling professional headshots for LinkedIn, business profiles, and corporate use.

services.name: Graduation Photography
services.description: Celebrate academic achievements with professional graduation photos that capture this milestone moment forever.

featured.title: Portrait Photography

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: Daniel captured our family perfectly! His attention to detail and professionalism made the entire experience wonderful.

testimonials.name: Mike Chen
testimonials.text: Daniel's professional headshots were perfect for my LinkedIn profile. Great quality and fast turnaround!

testimonials.name: Jessica Martinez
testimonials.text: Amazing graduation photos! Daniel made the whole session fun and the results were better than I could have imagined.
